II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency would like to add Independent Living as a service type on the license.
III. Methodology
Contact occurred with the Chief Administrator on 11/3/21, 11/4/21, 11/5/21, 11/8/21
and 11/10/21 to discuss the change. The CA wishes to service youth in Young Adult
Voluntary Foster Care, placed in foster homes or independent living placements.
An application was provided to DCWL on 11/10/21 to add this service type.
Policies & procedures were provided to DCWL on 11/10/21.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Agency policies and procedures were reviewed on 11/10/21 and found to be in
compliance with licensing rules.
The agency has sufficient staff to accommodate independent living cases, as current
foster care staff will manage any Independent Living cases that are accepted from
MDHHS.
V. Recommendation
It is recommended that Independent Living is added to the agencyâ€™s service type.
